meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or dismay.
meanings.sent1: Egads! I can't believe I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh, egads! Look at the size of that spider!
meanings.sent3: Egads, I accidentally wore mismatched socks to work today.
meanings.sent4: The news of the sudden storm outside made me exclaim, 'Egads!'
meanings.sent5: Egads, the magician made the rabbit disappear right before our eyes!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of astonishment or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Egads! That was the best movie I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Egads, I can't believe I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent3: Egads, I accidentally spilled juice all over my new shirt.
meanings.sent4: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop made me gasp, 'Egads!'
meanings.sent5: Egads, the fireworks display lit up the night sky with vibrant colors!
